scripts.deploy-safe: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && if [ "$BRANCH" = "deploy" ]; then vite build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Rebuild deploy' && git push origin deploy; else echo 'âš ï¸  Switch to deploy branch first (git switch deploy)'; fi
scripts.reset-dev: echo 'ğŸ§¹ Cleaning node_modules, dist, and .vite...' && npx rimraf node_modules dist .vite && echo 'ğŸ“¦ Reinstalling dependencies...' && npm install && echo 'ğŸš€ Starting dev server...' && npm run dev
scripts.reset-deploy: CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [ "$CURRENT_BRANCH" != "deploy" ]; then echo 'ğŸš« You are on "$CURRENT_BRANCH" â€” switch to deploy first (git switch deploy)'; exit 1; fi; echo 'ğŸŒ Pulling latest deploy branch...' && git pull origin deploy && echo 'ğŸ” Merging latest main...' && git merge main --no-edit || true && echo 'ğŸ—ï¸ Rebuilding production files...' && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'Rebuild deploy from clean main' || true && echo 'â¬†ï¸ Pushing to GitHub (deploy)...' && git push origin deploy --force && echo 'âœ… Deploy branch rebuilt and synced with main' && echo 'ğŸ”„ Switching back to main branch...' && git switch main && echo 'ğŸš€ Restarting local dev server...' && npm run dev
